channel.title: Softlayer_network_lbaas_healthmonitor on SoftLayer API
channel.description: Recent content in Softlayer_network_lbaas_healthmonitor on SoftLayer API

item.title: SoftLayer_Network_LBaaS_HealthMonitor
item.description: SoftLayer_Network_LBaaS_HealthMonitor Service Datatype Description Methods getObject Retrieve a SoftLayer_Network_LBaaS_HealthMonitor record. updateLoadBalancerHealthMonitors Update load balancer health monitors

item.title: SoftLayer_Network_LBaaS_HealthMonitor
item.description: SoftLayer_Network_LBaaS_HealthMonitor Service Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Network_LBaaS_HealthMonitor type presents a structure containing attributes of a health monitor object associated with load balancer instance. Note that the relationship between backend (pool) and health monitor is N-to-1, especially that the pools object associated with a health monitor must have the same pair of protocol and port. Example: frontend FA: http, 80 - backend BA: tcp, 3456 - healthmonitor HM_tcp3456 frontend FB: https, 443 - backend BB: tcp, 3456 - healthmonitor HM_tcp3456 In above example both backends BA and BB share the same healthmonitor HM_tcp3456

item.title: SoftLayer_Network_LBaaS_HealthMonitor
item.description: SoftLayer_Network_LBaaS_HealthMonitor Service Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Network_LBaaS_HealthMonitor type presents a structure containing attributes of a health monitor object associated with load balancer instance. Note that the relationship between backend (pool) and health monitor is N-to-1, especially that the pools object associated with a health monitor must have the same pair of protocol and port. Example: frontend FA: http, 80 - backend BA: tcp, 3456 - healthmonitor HM_tcp3456 frontend FB: https, 443 - backend BB: tcp, 3456 - healthmonitor HM_tcp3456 In above example both backends BA and BB share the same healthmonitor HM_tcp3456 Local createDate Type: dateTime

Overview Parameters Name Type Description Required Headers SoftLayer_Network_LBaaS_HealthMonitorInitParameters authenticate Optional Headers SoftLayer_Network_LBaaS_HealthMonitorObjectMask SoftLayer_Network_LBaaS_HealthMonitorObjectFilter SoftLayer_ObjectMask Return Values SoftLayer_Network_LBaaS_HealthMonitor

item.title: updateLoadBalancerHealthMonitors
item.description: SoftLayer_Network_LBaaS_HealthMonitor::updateLoadBalancerHealthMonitors Update load balancer health monitors Overview Update load balancers health monitor and return load balancer object with listeners (frontend), pools (backend), health monitor server instances (members) and datacenter populated Parameters Name Type Description loadBalancerUuid string healthMonitorConfigurations SoftLayer_Network_LBaaS_LoadBalancerHealthMonitorConfiguration[] Required Headers authenticate Optional Headers SoftLayer_Network_LBaaS_HealthMonitorObjectMask SoftLayer_ObjectMask Return Values SoftLayer_Network_LBaaS_LoadBalancer
